title: The 16 Most Comfortable Walking Shoes For Every Occasion
description: Having comfortable walking shoes incorporated into your wardrobe is a no-brainer, especially if you travel regularly, have an unbearably long commute to the office, or a job where you're standing all day. When shopping for the best walking shoes, it's important to look for pairs that are versatile enough to keep you feeling both supported and chic, regardless of where your day takes you. We find that fashionable walking shoes are the perfect happy medium, because they not only look good with all of your favorite outfits, but they're also the exact type of shoe we want to slip into for a concert or when we're out exploring a new city. Alternatively, if you love to take long walks around the neighborhood or to your local coffee shop, it's essential that you have a great pair of stylish walking shoes on hand. It's not always easy to find the best of both worlds with style and comfort, but we're here to make it possible. Ahead, we rounded up the most comfortable walking shoes that'll look great with all your outfits, from sleek trousers to stretchy, lift-me-up leggings - and they'll also give your feet the support they need for long excursions. Whether you're looking for the best sneakers for walking, are in the market for a pair of classic white sneakers, or simply want to stock up on good shoes for walking all day, we have no doubt you'll be able to find your new favorite wardrobe essential here. Keep reading to shop our picks for the best shoes for walking and standing all day. These comfortable walking shoes are options you'll want to slip into time and time again.
author: Kyley Warren
excerpt: Styles you can wear from the office to the airport and beyond.

Having comfortable walking shoes incorporated into your wardrobe is a no-brainer, especially if you travel regularly, have an unbearably long commute to the office, or a job where you're standing all day. When shopping for the best walking shoes, it's important to look for pairs that are versatile enough to keep you feeling both supported and chic, regardless of where your day takes you.

We find that fashionable walking shoes are the perfect happy medium, because they not only look good with all of your favorite outfits, but they're also the exact type of shoe we want to slip into for a concert or when we're out exploring a new city. Alternatively, if you love to take long walks around the neighborhood or to your local coffee shop, it's essential that you have a great pair of stylish walking shoes on hand. It's not always easy to find the best of both worlds with style and comfort, but we're here to make it possible.

Ahead, we rounded up the most comfortable walking shoes that'll look great with all your outfits, from sleek trousers to stretchy, lift-me-up leggings — and they'll also give your feet the support they need for long excursions.

Whether you're looking for the best sneakers for walking, are in the market for a pair of classic white sneakers, or simply want to stock up on good shoes for walking all day, we have no doubt you'll be able to find your new favorite wardrobe essential here.

Keep reading to shop our picks for the best shoes for walking and standing all day. These comfortable walking shoes are options you'll want to slip into time and time again.

Best Walking Shoes For Support

Adidas Cloudfoam Pure Shoes ($33-$60)

These Adidas Cloudfoam Pure Shoes are designed with comfort in mind. The everyday sneakers are fitted with a Cloudfoam cushioning that provides ample arch support, making them perfect for long days where you'll be on your feet a lot. Unlike other traditional walking shoes, they're incredibly stylish and feature Adidas's signature striped design.

Best Cushioned Walking Shoes

Reebok Club C 85 Vintage Walking Shoe ($45-$90)

You can never go wrong with a classic white sneaker, which is why stocking up on these sporty shoes from Reebok is such a good idea. These cute, comfortable shoes will match with everything you own. The insides are made with thick cushions that'll keep you warm and cozy. They're available in men's sizes, but if you're looking for the corresponding women's size, just subtract a size and a half from your typical size. For example, a women's size 8.5 would be a men's size 7.

Best Sneakers For Walking

Adidas UltraBoost 22 Running Shoes ($49)

If you're looking for a comfortable workout shoe that you can wear with anything outside the gym, then get these sleek shoes from Adidas. The popular silhouette is a bestseller for the brand. It feels like walking on a cushion thanks to the shoe's springboard-like base, and we really love these comfy sneakers for traveling. Plus, the pink shade will infuse some fun color into your wardrobe.

Best Walking Shoes With Velcro

Steve Madden Momentum White Sneakers ($75)

Unlike traditional lace-up shoes, velcro sneakers are much easier to adjust to your fit preferences — especially when you're on the go. This style walking shoe from Steve Madden boasts a cool velcro closure that's elevated by its cushioned sole and leather composition. The shoes are designed for everyday wear, with a lightweight silhouette that's made to provide long-lasting support — regardless of where your day takes you.

Best Stylish Walking Shoes

Nike Waffle Debut Sneakers ($75)

These stylish sneakers will take your outfit to the next level. The comfortable walking shoes come in seven seriously cute colorways, but we think the classic black sneakers will make the most functional addition to your wardrobe. Unlike other Nike silhouettes, this style is super lightweight, so they won't feel like they're weighing you down with each stride. Pair them with straight or wide-leg jeans or a crisp shirtdress for the breeziest ensemble.

Stylish Shoes For Walking All Day

Nike Dunk Low Basketball Sneaker ($78-$115)

Known for versatility, these Nike sneakers seamlessly blend style and comfort. Originally designed for basketball in the '80s, the Dunk Lows are now a streetwear staple thanks to the classic silhouette, padded collar for all-day wear, and endless colorways that let you express your style. Plus, the durable leather and grippy outsole make these both practical and fashionable. The shoe is also one of Ashley Graham's must-have products.

Best Shoes For Walking All Day

Sorel Kinetic Impact Strap Shoes ($80-$203)

Lace-up sneakers can be such a hassle, but with these slip-on shoes, you can easily squeeze your foot into the trainer and be on your merry way. The comfortable walking shoes feature a mesh design that promotes breathability and constant air flow, so you will feel light on your feet at all times and won't have to worry about them feeling too constricted. The shoe is also one of JoJo Fletcher's must-have products.

Best Walking Shoes For Sustainability

Cariuma Low Off-White Canvas Sneakers ($89)

These canvas sneakers from Cariuma are just as lightweight and airy as you'd imagine a shoe made from sustainable materials would be. The comfy sneakers are composed of recycled plastics, and for every pair bought, the brand plants two trees. In short: these are stylish walking shoes you can feel good about wearing for a number of reasons. Plus, they're also a favorite of PS's editors; read our review of the Cariuma Off-White Knit Sneaker to learn more.

Editor Quote: "Wearing these sneakers feels like wearing a feather: lightweight and gentle on your feet. Their knit material is so breathable that socks aren't a necessity. Truly, these shoes are like nothing I've ever tried before — they are incredibly comfortable and have a flexible design that bends with the shape of your feet. Ideally, they make a great summer shoe given how easy they are to slip on and off as well as their breathability (no sweaty feet)." — Haley Lyndes, former assistant editor, Shopping

Most Comfortable Walking Shoes

Allbirds Wool Sneakers ($98)

Customers are obsessed with these comfortable stylish shoes from Allbirds. The soft material and lightweight design make them perfect for all-day wear, and you could even sport them sans socks (trust us, they're actually that comfortable). The comfy sneakers come in more than a dozen colors, so you can find a pair that works for your personal style. We're not alone in our love for these shoes; Bryce Dallas Howard considers these a must-have pair of sneakers, too.

Best Cute and Comfortable Walking Shoes

New Balance 327 Sneakers ($100)

If you're looking for something colorful and cute, get these effortless everyday sneakers from New Balance. They have a supremely comfortable foam sole and were made for walking all day long. They can also be used for light movement and are a great comfy shoe for traveling; the rubbed outsole makes them more durable for wear outdoors and the shoe's ribbed bottom provides added traction when walking. There are a bunch of different colors available, but this multicolored pastel pair is bound to add a welcomed pop of color to your wardrobe. New Balance sneakers are a favorite of our editors; just read our review of these New Balance 9060 sneakers.

Editor Quote: "I'm not exaggerating when I say that these are the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned — and the pair that made me a New Balance loyalist for good. Even on my longest days outside of the house, I've been able to count on these shoes to keep me feeling comfortable, without any annoying pain in my heels or ankles." — Kyley Warren, former assistant editor, Shopping

Most Comfortable Athletic Sneakers

Hoka One One Clifton 9 Running Shoes ($116, originally $145)

Customers rave that these Hoka running shoes are beyond comfortable. The thick sole makes them a great choice if you want something with more support. These comfy shoes feel like you're walking on a cloud (as do most of Hoka's comfortable, stylish shoes), so if you struggle with shin splints, these are a great option. Our editors are big fans of Hoka sneakers — just read our roundup on the best running shoes to learn why.

Editor Quote: "Last year, the white colorway went viral and was incredibly difficult to find. Did I scour the internet only to eventually find them at my local running shop? Maybe. There are so many cute colorways to match whatever your style is. I've found these to be comfortable for long city walks as well as days spent at the gym. Hoka gets pretty specific in terms of what shoe is best for what activity, so I'd recommend making sure the style is right for your favorite activities before buying!" — Melissa Hayes, former marketing manager

Best Walking Shoes With a Platform

Nike Air Max 95 Essential Shoes ($140-$157)

These Nike sneakers are so comfortable, actress Meghann Fahy even called them one of her product must haves, saying she relied on the shoe while filming the second season of "The White Lotus" in Italy (quite the testimony!). The comfortable walking shoes have a hefty platform, which provides a more elevated look and also ample support beneath the foot. You'll feel good about wearing these to the gym, while traveling, or for any occasions where you might be standing on your feet a lot.

Best Walking Shoes With a Vintage Look

New Balance 990v5 Sneakers ($150-$185)

We love these classic, '90s-inspired sneakers from New Balance. They also come in black and a really cool navy blue, but the gray is as iconic as it gets. Plus, with the shoe's neutral coloring, they're easy to team with a variety of outfits. We can't get enough of New Balance sneakers these days — just read our review of the New Balance 9060 Sneakers to see why.

Editor Quote: "These sneakers are perfect for anyone who's looking for a quality everyday shoe that they can wear everywhere and with anything in their closet. This style is designed to be a pair that you can wear to the gym, airport, out on a girl's night, and beyond." — Kyley Warren, former assistant editor, Shopping

Most Versatile Walking Shoes

APL TechLoom Breeze Knit Running Shoes ($154-$220)

Our editors have tried what feels like every sneaker on the market, and APL's running shoes have proven to be the best of the best. They're admittedly pricier than the average sneaker, but they really hold up — and thus are a truly worthwhile investment. The shoes have superior cushioning and support but still feel lightweight and easy to move in. You can wear these comfy sneakers to walk, run, dance, box, or do any high-impact activity, and they're also a great shoe to take when you travel. You can read our review of the APL TechLoom Zipline Sneakers for the full product details.

Editor Quote: "These shoes are supremely comfortable. The upper is really breathable, and it's all one layer, so it's really easy to slip on and off. The zip lines, or essentially loops around the shoe, were created to provide extra support to a lightweight style. Plus, the shoe has FutureFoam technology, which is designed to provide high-quality rebounding with a lightweight feel." — India Yaffe, former associate editor, Shopping

Best Stylish Walking Shoes For Everyday Wear

Saye Modelo '89 Sneakers ($159)

We love the look of these cool new sneakers from Saye. The stylish walking shoes are made from recycled and organic materials, so you can feel good about buying them. They come in so many cool colors, like red, black, and blue, but we love this fun green shade that feels extra nostalgic. The shoes also have a firm base and silhouette that helps to keep feet feeling secure and supported, regardless of how much walking you'll be doing.

Most Comfortable Boots For Walking

Nisolo Ana Go-To Heeled Chelsea Boot ($199, originally $250)

If you find the right pair, boots can be a comfortable option, too. Nisolo shoes are designed for all-day wear, which is proven by the rubber lug sole on the small block heel that also lends height. These comfy boots boast a five-layer memory-foam insole, so the construction feels functional. Wear them with jeans or cargo pants, and shop them in three versatile colorways.
